commit_list.repo_description: A cross platform implementation of the Safe String Library (StrSafe.h) provided by Microsoft. The library will allow multi platform software to use a single library for safe string operations. This will reduce the risk for buffer overflows and will increase code sharing between code for different platforms.

commit_list.message: Let StringCbPrintf go through StringCbVPrintf before going to StringCchVprintf. This is done to reduce the number of places where character and byte count are mixed. It also increases the test coverage of the VPrintf functions.

commit_list.repo_description: A cross platform implementation of the Safe String Library (StrSafe.h) provided by Microsoft. The library will allow multi platform software to use a single library for safe string operations. This will reduce the risk for buffer overflows and will increase code sharing between code for different platforms.

commit_list.message:
Added the code implemented as a qualification project for the GSoC
application.

The added code contains draft implementations of the following
functions:
 * StringCchCatA
 * StringCchCopyA
 * StringCchLengthA
 * StringCbCatA
 * StringCbCopyA
 * StringCbLengthA
